transcript.title: TRANSCRIPT OF DOORSTOP, PHILLIP ST, SYDNEY 10 DECEMBER 1990
transcript.content:
TRANSCR1P'V OF DOORSTOP, PHILLIP STREET, SYDNEY
DECEMBER 1990
E OE PROOW ONLY
JOURNALIST: (~ inaudible)
PM: All I wanit to say is this# I will be seeing the Treasurer
later today in Canberra and that's all I've got to say at this
stage.
JOURNALIST: it time to out Placido Domingo's vocal chords?
PM: Good question. I've got nothing to add to what I've said.
I expect to be seeing Mr Keating later in Canberra today.
JOURNALIST: You look very relaxed.
PM: Yeu, I feel very relaxed.
ends
